apple_vendor_description: The kiss between a woman and a man with light and medium-dark skin tones, as depicted on Apple devices, is a tender moment captured with subtle, realistic lighting and smooth gradients. Their faces are gently angled towards each other, with softly closed eyes and rosy cheeks, embodying a genuine expression of affection. The polished, 3D aesthetic on Apple devices makes this emoji feel intimate and heartfelt, symbolizing romance, love, and deep connection in messages.
